IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: Provision of Nursing Care,Hospice Care, and Medical Equipment and supplies to home bound patients
IRS990.MissionDescription: Provision of Nursing Care Hospice Care and Medical Equipment and supplies to home bound patients
IRS990.Description: PROVISION OF SKILLED HOME CARE SERVICES UNDER THE DIRECT SUPERVISON OF A PHYSICIAN

Activity2.Description: HOSPICE CARE: HOSPICE CARE FOR THE TERMINALLY ILL INCLUDING MEDICAL, NURSING AND PERSONAL CARE BOTH IN PATIENTS HOME AND IN THE HOSPICE RESIDENSE

Activity3.Description: RENTAL AND SALES OF HOME AND DURABLE MEDICAL EQUIPMETN AND SUPPLIES TO PATIENTS

ActivityOther.Description: Immunization Programs & Private duty nursing including health screening, immuniaztion and pediatric waiver care.

IRS990ScheduleA.GeneralExplanation: Miscellaneous income including vending machine receipts from breakroom and other non-program related revenue.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: PART VIII E A INVESTMENT INCOME

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: Country Club Dues Chief Executive Officer

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.Relationship: Member of Board of Directors & Banker

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THREE FINANCE STAFF PROFESSIONALS ARE INVOLVED IN THE PROCESS OF PREPARING AND REVIEWING THE 990 FILING INCLUDING THE CHIEF FINANCIAL / CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER, CONTROLLER AND FINANCIAL ANALYST. WHEN QUESTIONS ARISE CONCERNING WHAT IS BEING ASKED TO BE REPORTED, ALL THREE REVIEW THE INSTRUCTIONS AND MAKE CONSCENSUS DECISIONS ON HOW TO PROCEED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 8b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THERE ARE NO STANDING COMMITTEES OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORES OF LIFESPAN, INC. ANY ACTIONS TAKEN BY A COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OR ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE BOARD AS A WHOLE ARE DOCUMENTED IN THE BOARD MINUTES

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Three finance staff professionals are involved in the process of preparing and reviewing the 990 filing including the Chief Executive/Finance Officer, Controller, and Financial Analyst. When questions arise concerning what is being asked to be reported, all three review the instructions and make concensus decisions on how to proceed.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER IS DETERMINED ANNUALLY BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORES OF LIFESPAN, INC. THIS COMMITTEE DOES NOT INCLUDE THE CEO AND BASES ITS DECISION IN PART BY COMPARISIONS WITH NATIONAL AND REGIONAL SURVEY DATA. THE DECISION IS THEN COMMUNICATED IN WRITING TO THE AFFECTED PARTIES.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: WRITTEN REQUESTS FOR GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES AND INCLUDING THOSE RELATED TO CONFLICTS OF INTEREST, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS MAY BE SUBMITTED TO THE DIRECTOR OF COMPLIANCE OF LIFESPAN, INC. ALL REASONALBLE REQUESTS FOR SUCH INFORMATION WILL BE CONSIDERED.
